# Ampsec Scripts from Fresnedo 2019
## Initial setup to run Singularity  
Info obtained from https://github.com/JFresnedo/AmpSeq/blob/master/Preliminaries.md

```{bash setup}
ssh sgabriel@rhino.unl.edu
```


```{bash}
pwd
```


```{bash}
cd $WORK

# Creating a folder  
mkdir AmpSec3
cd AmpSec3
git clone https://github.com/JFresnedo/AmpSeq.git

#singularity won't load in working node so changing to a working node
srun --nodes=1 --ntasks-per-node=2 --mem-per-cpu=32g --time=2:00:00 --pty $SHELL
module load singularity/3.2

#Pulling the container (info from the github and https://singularity-hub.org/collections/2392)
singularity pull --name AmpSeq.sif shub://JFresnedo/AmpSeq:ampseq
# This will generatate the AmpSeq.sif 
to load the container 
singularity shell AmpSeq.sif

#To test open 
vcftools or etc
```

## Running the examples
Use the MD files from the github example
